strapiPost.title: Pet-a-palooza First Friday Today In Bentonville
strapiPost.content:
Bentonville’s First Friday is back today and the theme is Pet-a-palooza. So bring your dogs, cats, birds, and pets of all types to be celebrated as a part of Bentonville’s monthly festival.

  • Party pups: The community event is free and welcomes all community members and visitors. For the pets, there will be a bring-your-own-pet Beer Garden, a pet playground, pet portraits, a dog obstacle course and lure track, and so much more! 
  • Animals on the square: The festivities will go from 11-9p on the Bentonville Square, and live music will be on the main stage starting at 5p. There will be the usual food trucks and local vendors as well as a couple of mini petting zoos, pony rides, and more. If nothing else, go watch people participate in goat yoga!

Learn more HERE.
